    #include<iostream>
    #include<cstdio>
    #include<algorithm>
    #include<cmath>
    using namespace std;
    typedef long long int ll;
    int main()
    {
        ll t,x,y,z;
        cin>>t;
        while(t--)
        {
           cin>>x>>y>>z;
           ll a[]={x,y,z};
           sort(a,a+3);
           cout<<a[1]<<'\n';
        }
        return 0;
    }
